bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>

<denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Run <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1-_LKx4HwAxl5M6xPJmqAAu444LTDQoa3>https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1-_LKx4HwAxl5M6xPJmqAAu444LTDQoa3</denchmark-link> with There were other error when trying to run with other versions from ["1.5" , "20200325", "nightly"] neither of them seem to work properly, there's always some sort of bug that pops up. at this one moment when i had finally got it to run the model, the second time i ran the cell, it crashed, could be that i had to free up mem. but i dont see why it shouldn't have been done automatically.

comments.comment: Hi! thanks for your contribution!, great first issue!

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/satyajitghana>@satyajitghana</denchmark-link> It worked fine for me with nightly. Could you try it again with nightly? Do let me know if there's any bug that pops up with it.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/satyajitghana>@satyajitghana</denchmark-link> any update on this? Otherwise bug will be closed.

it works on latest nightly ! close issue <denchmark-link:#>‚Ä¶</denchmark-link>
